title: Notification Subscription
description: Adobe Campaign notification subscriptions allow end-users opt into topics that can be used for communication such as marketing subscription lists.

topicID.title: Topic Identifier
topicID.description: The topic that the end-user has subscribed to and opted into notifications for.

subscriptionDate.title: Subscription Date
subscriptionDate.description: Date and time when the end-user has subscribed to a notification topic. An end-user is subscribed if they have a Subscription Date and the `unsubscriptiondetails/unsubscriptionDate` is empty.

notificationTarget.title: Target/destination for the notification
notificationTarget.description: Target/destination for where to send/receive the notification.
